de.mash1t.chat.networking.methods

Class AbstractNetworkProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mash1t.chat.networking.methods.AbstractNetworkProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkProtocol
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCP

    public abstract class AbstractNetworkProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkProtocol
    Abstract class for mainly handling static methid call of send(packet, thread, nwpType) Methods have to be implemented by childs
